rules_text:
Convoke [i](Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature’s color.)[/i]
When this creature enters, choose one –
• [i]They Overwhelm You – [/i]Target opponent takes a burden.
• [i]They Surround You[/i] – Create two 1/1 black Horror creature tokens.
